pages.text: Pharaoh, inshi pered tym, yak yo, ta hrishnyky (Sodom) buv bezputni
Vony ne pidkoryalysya kur'yeru yikhnʹoho Lorda. Otzhe, Vin requited yim spustoshlyvyy requital
potik spustoshuvav, takym chynom my perevezly vas na plavayuchi (ark)
My nadaly tse urok dlya vas, shcho budʹ-yake slukhayuche vukho mozhe zrozumity
Koly rih duyetʹsya odnoho razu
zemlya ta hory budutʹ nosytysya ta budutʹ davytysya; nadzvychayno rozdavlenyy
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly nemynucha podiya prybude proyty
nebesa trisnutʹ, ta padinnya okremo
anhely budutʹ vsi navkolo, ta Vash dominion Lorda todi okhopytʹ visim (vsesvit)
Na shcho denʹ, vy budete exposed, nichoho vy ne mozhete buty prykhovani
Yak dlya khto otrymuye yoho zapys z yoho pravom ruka, vin skazhe, "Prybuvayutʹ prochytanyy miy zapys
ya vvazhav, shcho ya zbyravsya buty vlashtovanyy pidzvitnyy
Vin zasluzhyv shchaslyve zhyttya
U exalted Ray
Yoho frukty blyzʹki
Hostyatʹsya ta napiy happily v obmin na vashi pratsi u dnyakh mynulykh
Tomu shcho dlya nʹoho komu dayetʹsya yoho zapys u yoho lysheniy rutsi, vin skazhe, "O, ya by khotiv, shchob ya nikoly ne otrymav miy zapys
ya by khotiv, shchob ya nikoly ne znav miy rakhunok
ya by khotiv, shchob moya smertʹ bula vichna
Moyi hroshi ne mozhutʹ dopomohty meni
Vsya moya potuzhnistʹ znyknutʹ
Berutʹ yoho ta shackle yoho
Horyatʹ yo u Pekli
U lantsyuzi tse - simdesyat ozbroyennya dovho, pryv'yazuyutʹ yoho
Dlya vin ne viryv v BOHU, Naybilʹsh Velykomu
Ne zrobyv vin zakhyshchayutʹ hoduyuchyy bidnyy
